body_html:
@civilman628 this sounds like it could be a documentation issue. Can you specify which model you are trying to restore, and where you expected to see instructions on restoring it?

.ckpt files are indeed insufficient on their own, usually you need a .py file and instructions that tells you how to run it

body:
@civilman628 this sounds like it could be a documentation issue. Can you specify which model you are trying to restore, and where you expected to see instructions on restoring it?

`.ckpt` files are indeed insufficient on their own, usually you need a  `.py` file and instructions that tells you how to run it
